 there are several beads attached. The main chain of the necklace where the pendant is attached to has a butterfly link chain
 that is also inset with gemstones.

sgcool_label_text:The necklace is made of gilded silver and features a large central pendant inset with gemstones
 with beads at the bottom of the pendant. The pendant is attached to the main chain of the necklace with a butterfly decoration similarly set with gemstones. They were often crafted by Indian goldsmiths. The intricacy of the patterns and designs were closely associated with the financial and social status of the wearer.  Although commonly used in China to prevent tarnishing
 the practice of gilding silver did not become popular in India.  Peranakan Indians were descended from marriages between South Indian Hindu merchants and local inhabitants.
